headline: Progressive Reports November 2024 Results
summary: MAYFIELD VILLAGE, OHIO, Dec. 13, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) today reported the following results for the month ended November 30, 2024: November(millions, except per share amounts and ratios; unaudited) 2024 2023 ChangeNet premiums written$5,563.3 $4,725.1 18 %Net premiums earned$6,040.4 $5,079.0 19 %Net income$1,005.8 $680.6 48 %Per share available to common shareholders$1.71 $1.15 48 %Total pretax net realized gains (losses) on securities$175.7 $246.5 (29)%

headline: Your Home-Insurance Bill Has Only One Way to Go: Up
